meta.job_title: Senior Vice President of Corporate Partnerships

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop a multi-year strategy to achieve ambitious partnership revenue growth goals aligned with the company's vision and mission.
Connect directly with key executives of leading national and global brands to increase sales and investment opportunities.
Lead and develop a team of professionals to accomplish partnership sales and marketing goals.
Build strong relationships with corporate leaders, sports organizations, and civic and community leaders to ensure mutually beneficial outcomes.
Assess partnership performance, advance initiatives, and identify opportunities for increased sales.
Present the status of partnerships to the ownership group and key stakeholders.
Adapt quickly as business needs evolve.
